message.body: wasn't it the trap stage i tested for you?
Cosmic told me that Swordslinga cheats at Halo
I thought you two played together not against each other
we did, played grifball and campaign
we're obviously starting with the basement right?
yooo it's the fangame of the year 2021
I remember 2021 like if it was a month and a few days ago ( •ᴗ•)ψ
i know who soapbar actually is and this stage is very based because of it
last place is perfect for it
proof that the judges were nitpicking and biased
you experience it first since it's the first floor
so who was patient enough to run this game?
this is the only stage like this anyways
geezer did, nal and wolsk ran it I think, also verve
probably some others I don't remember
i always thought the golden rule with any review site was that you were allowed to leave a review with 0 hours of playtime
secrets show up on the door if they're there
probably had to shoot the laser switch again
music kinda reminds me of goodbye horses
but its no 69 so its fine
Think around mid 70s early 80s would be my limit for things getting a bit hard, though i haven't played in 2 years and standards are different so, what do i know
i know one secret is at the end i'm pretty sure
the biggest secret is that fact that Denferok is married and has 4 children
I think I remember where the second secret in this stage is
Love bosses, which react on player`s shooting speed:)
meem stages are historically hard to import lmao
in GBC his stages were nonstandard size for some reason
Mushroom Kingdom sadly doesn't have very many if any ballistic weaponry
honestly considering its been historically hard from what i'm hearing its probably a very deliberate choice
did you read the reviews for soapbars?
Tj had to god mode twice? the fuck was this stage back then?
Are the reviews meme-y, or do they really hate everything? :p
these are the lowest rated stages
most of these are definitely not a meme
so the reviews are going to be mostly negative
play them as the gods intended, but do you want too is the question LUL
this is why this stage is here
how hard is it to get to the top and say fuck this maze?
invis block on top so very
shiiit old necropolis is in this playlist
now i'm sure all the reviewers enjoyed that maze
so from what i can gather, literally everyone loved that maze
when was the last time you even laid eyes on this game?
not surprising you wouldn't remember shit then
i didn't watch but gz on the win again
gratz on your share of the game of the year award
denferok l needle game coming soon
scope creep is an insurmountable obstacle
post-rebalance this stage is a lot better than it's placed
tj is the simon cowell of nanc2 judges
that didn't feel that long, guess it was long prenerf?
yeah there were two cut screens
honestly those are rather respectable scores for something that's extremely short and what seems like an effort
i think i'm stalled out on one of the star stages still
did all the main stages though
been in the community for like a year but still barely cleared anything
this is where the flav clip is from
"i should do the secrets as i find them""
i like how the background is piece's parkour stage
do the second jump alil earlier
you wanna do it after the lower cycle goes but before the upper cycle
still kind of a pain tho
can i have a small loan of a billion points?
Actually i think that games you're very familiar with are best for derusting. So k3 might not be as terrible as youd think
btw do you plan on reaching 1000 clears soon
would this mean the fabled 1.5 run on angel mode is gonna happen?
many chokes were had for me on that part
this is a bit harder than I remembered
in what order are you doing the stages?
Perm_Agility subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 44 months! Pogger
I somehow didn't check my email, discord, or twitch yesterday and it turns out there was an entire fangame awards.
final stage is like, the best part of the game
you can definitely tell it's the reason this game took so long
i'm planning to buy a vr headset LUL
fangames in VR, running around and jumping to dodge all the bullets LUL
Well, I've got something to watch later, so that's nice.
@perm_agility, Well, we take beat saber, add to this shooting options and could torment people :D
someone did make a vr recreation of lovetrap miku i believe
or just go with Runescape VR standing and swinging your arm at a tree for 300 hours KEKW
@perm_agility, Ultima! We need Ultima Online in VR! :D
I'm sure. It's the only awards show I enjoy watching. @joaoTforce
oh i see what the secret is
gotta do it while only getting hit a certain amount of times i think
You have 8 HP, is that a bit too much?
If you have 8hp you have to use all the lives LUL
you did i saw what it was and you didn't read it in time
it probably wouldn't of been too hard to go for at the same time though would have to replay the stage again lmao
harsh, but yeah, I dunno how the original was
they probably ended up changing it
yeah, these are all pre-change reviews
worth noting that apparently the original version didn't have the numbers to indicate the order of the switches
keep in mind this is all based on the og version of the stages
this stage had like half the screens tuirned into extra
Understandable also iirc you made coinstack and i believe it won an award so i want to congratulate you on that!
u deserve it man, big time
Yeah I haven’t played it myself but just from the little ive seen and what ive heard about it it seems like a really good game!
the art production in coinstack is actually really good
u gotta have some stolen rpgmaker tiles here and there
some guy rock tiles for the first stage yknow...
it just has to be that way
TJ is quite the harsh critic
yeah we went out of our way to nerf a lot of these too
After you beat all the stages do you think it would be a good idea to rank them from worst to best or as a tier list thing?
Starz0r making stuff that is too difficult?
I feel a bit bad at how low this placed in retrospect
yeah this ended up a rly memorable stage
this one was a lot of fun for me
this reminds me, I haven't played much of this since I was busy with an avoidance backlog
you can grabble anything , i think. even the red shuriken from the room before
i thought the red and blue ones have the same properties.
rotational physics, if the radius is longer then your speed is faster
you want to be as flat as possible, so you reach a certain distance
this stage is unsurprisingly quite fun to replay
but my question was if you can turn longer, and if that changes the outcome of the jump.
bit janky the first time but once you get used to it you're vibing
that one little magic square at the top
im gonna call the iwbtg community :mad:
speedrunner does fangames the not intended way
